channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Playtime Towers
channel.desc: Pockets. Bella and Lift visit Patch in the Cloud Kitchen. He has found a tiny mouse in his pocket, which reminds him of a tasty treat recipe to make with the Playtimers - pocket mouse pitta.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Time for School
channel.desc: Jud and Lucas Become Friends. Lucas is looking for more friends to play with. Jud suggests a fun-filled game of chase.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Maisie the Mechanic. The cafe is noisy because the cupboards are creaking and Small's scooter is squeaking.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: What's in Your Bag?
channel.desc: Imam. In this episode, we meet Ajmal, an Imam who tells us all about how his Rehal helps to hold important books and why it's so important to him as a Muslim.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Stormy Mountain. Dan and Jamie race to find some hikers to warn them about an approaching storm.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie's Do You Know?
channel.desc: Playground and Plant Pot. At a playground, Maddie learns how swings and slides work, then she visits a plant pot factory to see how pots are made by mixing clay and shale.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Bowl. Dee encourages a friend to say 'bowl', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore lots of different types of bowls.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: Nine's Time to Shine. Meet the Nine Times Table as he performs a song to show how you can just add ten and take one away to find out who's next in line from Nine to Ninety.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: Up. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life by holding hands. U gets the balloon ride of his life, but he is still unhappy - or so he thinks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Wonderblocks
channel.desc: Go. Wonderblock Go gets everything and everyone moving! It's noisy, exciting fun. However, things start to go wrong quickly until Wonderblock Stop arrives.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Deep Blue and Sky Blue. Blue meets new friends Deep Blue and Sky Blue and learns all about their favourite things.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Art Badge. The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires them while preparing their own pieces for Tino the Artistic Mouse's Woodland Biennale.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: The Pop-Ups. Stripes's attempts to write a song about his love for the Sunhouse are interrupted by the rest of the gang. Can Yukee find a way to help him finish his song.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Pets. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Mr Tumble looks for his pet dog's squeaky toy bone, while Justin spends the day with his friends and their pet dogs.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Train Ride. Preschool series. Po makes far too much tubby custard, and the children in Tummy Tales take a ride on a steam train.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Kipp's Dizzy Mystery. When Kipp doesn't know what made him giddy, it's up to Vida to solve the dizzy mystery.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Game Catchers
channel.desc: What Animal Are You? The Game Catchers land on a Technological Planet to learn the game what animal are you? But before they can start, they must search for Nina.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
channel.desc: Giraffe and Red Panda. Steve and Aneeshwar meet a ginormous giraffe and a hungry red panda.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle and George. Preschool comedy drama series. Mrs Hobbs's cat George gets locked inside her house, giving Waffle a chance to prove himself to Mrs Hobbs. Can he rescue George.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Topsy and Tim
channel.desc: Sore Paw. Grandma's dog Mossy isn't feeling very well. Tim suggests they bake some doggy biscuits to cheer her up, but it is vet Topsy who discovers what is wrong.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Fluffytown Swap Day. Love Monster has a clear-out for a bring-and-swap event but can't let his old things go.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee Songs
channel.desc: The Summer Holidays Song. Put on a loud shirt and join Hennie - she can't wait to get away on a holiday. Sea and sun and lots of fun. See you on the roof terrace.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Missing Lake. Tracker finds trapped creatures in an underground tunnel after falling into a sinkhole.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: A Big Day Out for D.O.R.I.S. Dad gets trapped in the shower when D.O.R.I.S. decides to visit the sea. Can Big Lizard and Cosima stop her before she does herself permanent damage.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Dino Danger. A toy dinosaur escapes from its box and scares the Grape Kids.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Exercise Badge. Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of Cotton-Tail's Tooth. Animated series. When Cotton-tail is taken ill, Peter must fetch Dr Bobtail through the snow-covered woods. Mr Tod has other ideas.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Time for School
channel.desc: Solomon's Exciting Day. Solomon and his friends are practising letters with Miss Gerrard. Later, they have a go on the climbing wall - who will be able to make it across.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Mojo Swoptops
channel.desc: Runaway Tour. Preston's automated scooter tour of Swoppiton doesn't go as planned. Mojo and Bo must find a way to chase down and scoop up those scooters, and get the tour back on track.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Onesies. When Mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings Bluey and Bingo onesies.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Road Trip. Bluey and Bingo find ways to entertain themselves on a family road trip.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: Brinicle's Shopping Spree. The Piris try to change Brinicle's wasteful ways, but their recycling plan hits a snag.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dog Squad
channel.desc: Big Bear. Therapy dog Sylvie uses her superheart to help the children on their first day at school.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
channel.desc: Waffle Gets Snowy. Callum takes Evie, Doug, Simon and Waffle for after-school fun at an indoor snow arena.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Owl School. Baba wants to be an owl. Oona shows Baba that puffins are cool too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Find a Dinosaur. JoJo and Gran Gran go to the museum to find a giant fossilised Tyrannosaurus rex skeleton.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Moon and Me
channel.desc: Everything Smells Lovely. In the little Toy House, Pepi Nana shows everybody a book about the rain. In Storyland it's raining, so all of the friends share the umbrella.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Snow Business. Animation about a family of small creatures who live on, and inside, a planet. The cloud goes on holiday in space, but returns freezing cold and snowing, not raining.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Igglepiggle's Mucky Patch. Series for young children. Igglepiggle falls and gets mud on his tummy. Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy ride in the Ninky Nonk and get muck over that too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Sharon D Clarke - Rusty the Squeaky Robot. Rusty is the only robot on Planet Robotone who squeaks, but he soon learns that it's good to be different. Read by Sharon D Clarke.
